lead_paragraph: BARTOS--Michael. The Board of Directors, staff and fellow shareholders of 82-83 Tenants Corp. mourn the passing of Michael Bartos, a member of our Board and long time resident of 40 East 83rd Street. We extend our deepest sympathy to his wife, Joan, and his children, Catherine, Peter and John. 1/3
